name: midas-pro-osc
description: Browse, search, and control Midas Pro Series mixing consoles (Pro2C, Pro1, etc.) over OSC. Includes a complete database of 4,500+ reverse-engineered OSC commands.
long_description:
This extension gives Claude full knowledge of the Midas Pro Series OSC command set â€” over 4,500 endpoints reverse-engineered from console firmware. Use it to:

- **Discover commands**: Search across 33 control groups covering mic inputs, masters, aux returns, EQ, FX, mute groups, VCA groups, and more.
- **Build OSC paths**: Get the exact OSC address to send for any parameter.
- **Control your console**: Connect to a live Midas Pro mixer on your network and get/set any parameter via natural language.

Perfect for live sound engineers, theater technicians, and anyone automating a Midas Pro Series console.

Based on the community reverse-engineering work at github.com/Guffawker/midas-pro-series-osc-commands.

tools.name: list_groups
tools.description: List all 33 Midas Pro Series control groups with endpoint counts

tools.name: list_endpoints
tools.description: List all endpoints in a specific control group

tools.description: Search across all 4,500+ OSC endpoints by keyword

tools.name: get_endpoint_info
tools.description: Get complete details and usage hints for a specific endpoint

tools.name: build_osc_command
tools.description: Construct the exact OSC path for a command

tools.description: Connect to a Midas Pro console on the network

console_ip.title: Console IP Address
console_ip.description: IP address of your Midas Pro Series console (e.g. 192.168.1.100). Leave blank to use the search/browse tools without a live connection.
